typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		quote_number as string,
		timestamp as string,
		channel as string,
		region as string,
		dateofbirth as string,
		license_years as string,
		num_convictions as string,
		num_fault_claims as string,
		make as string,
		model as string,
		manfyear as string,
		purchaseyear as string,
		fuel_type as string,
		transmission_type as string,
		payment_plan as string,
		nature_of_use as string,
		overnightparking_loc as string,
		policy_start_date as string,
		premium as string,
		converted as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
